articles.author: Martin Lerma
articles.title: BMW’s New 4 Series Flips the Bird to Purists With a Big-Mouth Grille - Robb Report
articles.description: The German automaker's newest design takes its principal design cue from the Concept 4.
articles.content:
BWM wants you to get all up in its grille. Literally.
Sure, German auto engineering hasn’t always been the most adventurous (precision, quality, longevity—yes, we know). But it looks like the BMW’s forthcoming 4 Series Coupe doesn’t care much about your expe… [+1727 chars]

articles.title: Redmi 9 surfaces on Xiaomi’s official site, launch is imminent - Gizchina.com
articles.description: The Redmi 9 was spotted on Xiaomi's official site along with its Redmi Note 9 siblings. The handset will be launched soon with Helio G70 SoC.
articles.content: Xiaomi completed its plans for the Redmi Note 9 series with the release of the vanilla Note 9 in the last month. Now, all the three devices are Globally available, but what about the Redmi 9? Of course, in recent years, the Note lineup has completely stolen t… [+1256 chars]

articles.author: Jeremy Winslow
articles.title: Fortnite Party Royale Event: How To Watch The Deadmau5 And Steve Aoki Concert - GameSpot
articles.description: Chill out with your Fortnite friends today during the battle royale's Party Royale Premiere live show. It features performances from major electronic dance musicians like Deadmau5 and Steve Aoki.
articles.content: Epic Games, the creator of the popular battle royale game Fortnite, has announced that the Party Royale Premiere event will go live today on mobile devices, Nintendo Switch, PC, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One. The non-combative experience will feature live conce… [+1941 chars]

articles.author: Steven Petite
articles.title: Today-Only: Stock Up On PS4, Xbox One, And Switch Games For Cheap - GameSpot
articles.description: GameStop's one-day flash sale on PS4, Xbox One, and Switch games was extended for an extra day and includes God of War and Grand Theft Auto V. The more you buy, the more you save.
articles.content: If you're looking to stock up on games while social distancing, GameStop's one-day only flash sale lets you save up to 50% off on pre-owned games under $20, and it was extended for an additional day. The more you buy, the more you save, and plenty of excellen… [+2428 chars]

articles.title: CoD Patch Notes: .357 Nerfed In Modern Warfare And Warzone Update - GameSpot
articles.description: The latest Call of Duty update is out now and it patches in a fix to "help prevent vehicle exploits" and more.
articles.content: Developer Infinity Ward has rolled out a new Call of Duty update for both Modern Warfare and Warzone on PC, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One. We've compiled the full May 7 patch notes below for what to expect next time you boot up the game. The update doesn't make… [+2076 chars]

articles.title: Samsung patches security vulnerability impacting all Galaxy phones sold since 2014 - 9to5Google
articles.description: A security vulnerability on Samsung's Android phones sold since 2014 left the door open for attackers, but it's in the process of being patched.
articles.content: Android gets a lot of flak for security, but most of the time errors can be traced back to changes that were made to the open-source platform. This week, a security vulnerability in every Android phone Samsung has sold since 2014 was patched after being expos… [+1537 chars]

articles.title: AMD Ryzen 4000 Renoir 8-Core Desktop CPUs Leak Again With Integrated Radeon GPUs - Hot Hardware
articles.description: The first Ryzen 4000 chip is clocked at 3GHz, while the second chip comes in at 3.5GHz.
articles.content: Back in early March, which seems like ages ago considering the past two months we’ve gone through, we received our first glimpse at AMD’s upcoming Renoir-based Ryzen 4000 (Zen 2) desktop processors. As you might expect, these processors are cut from the same … [+1709 chars]

articles.description: iPhone 12's leaked dimensions show that it may be smaller than the new iPhone SE with a full-size display
articles.content:
The iPhone 12 will reportedly come in four sizes, ranging from 5.4 inches all the way up to 6.7 inches, but its the smallest model that will likely grab the most attention.

articles.author: Bogdan Popa
articles.title: Google Finally Confirms an Android Auto Bug Hitting Its Own Phones - autoevolution
articles.description: Google’s Pixel is technically supposed to provide you with the best Android and Android Auto experience, but this doesn’t necessarily mean that everything is working just as expected.
articles.content: Some unlucky Pixel owners know this best, as Android Auto is now listed as unsupported when they connect their phones to their cars.Android displays a message reading “this app isn’t compatible with your device anymore. Contact the developers for more info.”… [+1517 chars]
